name: techpivot-streaming-slack-notify-api-slack-authorize
description: Lambda function that responds and authorizes new Slack OAuth2 application requests

scripts.package: tsc && rm -rf lib/templates && cp -Rf src/templates lib/templates && node-lambda package
scripts.test: tsc && rm -rf lib/templates && cp -Rf src/templates lib/templates && node-lambda run

author: TechPivot
